==== /a.js (2 errors) ====
    export class C {
        /**
         * @template T
         * @this {T}
         * @return {T}
                    ~
!!! error TS2304: Cannot find name 'T'.
         */

            return this;
        }

         * @template T
         * @this {T}
         * @return {T}
                    ~
!!! error TS2304: Cannot find name 'T'.
         */
        b() {
            return this;
        }
    }

    a; // typeof C
